ground_truth.thought: 基于获取的数据进行趋势分析
ground_truth.name: PolygonFinance.analyze_trend

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_historical_data', 'description': 'Get historical stock data for a given ticker over a specified period', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The stock ticker symbol'}, {'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The period for which to fetch historical data, e.g., 1y for 1 year'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_realtime_price', 'description': 'Get the real-time stock price for a given ticker', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The stock ticker symbol'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.analyze_trend', 'description': 'Analyze the trend of a stock based on historical data', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The stock ticker symbol'}, {'name': 'data', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'The historical data to analyze'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'trend', 'description': 'The trend analysis result'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.analyze_momentum', 'description': 'Analyze the momentum of a stock based on historical data', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The stock ticker symbol'}, {'name': 'data', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'The historical data to analyze'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'momentum', 'description': 'The momentum analysis result'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解特斯拉公司的技术分析。首先，请获取特斯拉公司过去一年的股票价格数据。然后，基于这些数据，进行趋势分析和动量指标分析。接下来，获取特斯拉公司的实时股票价格。最后，请提供基于技术分析的投资建议。
获取特斯拉公司过去一年的股票价格数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'ticker'的值是什么?
当前工具的参数'period'的值是什么?

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是基于提供的历史数据进行特斯拉（TSLA）的趋势分析和动量分析。
